NK039(ti)027:1: // dpal ldan lha mo'i sbyin bsreg bzhugs so //
NK039(ti)027:3: dpal ldan lha mo'i sbyin bsreg la /
NK039(ti)027:4: dang po mdun du me thab gcig /
NK039(ti)027:8: las bum nang du rdo rje gnod sbyin bskyed la /
NK039(ti)027:11: de nas yi dam du bskyed la me sbar /
NK039(ti)027:13: de nas las bum chus gtor la 'di skad do //
NK039(ti)027:14: h'uh ye shes sprin dpung mkha' la bdud rtsi'i char pa 'babs //
NK039(ti)027:15: mi gtsang tshogs rnams dag gyur cig /
NK039(ti)027:16: sarba sam shwa d+ha na ye s+w+aa h+aa /
NK039(ti)027:17: de nas me lha bskyed pa ni /
NK039(ti)027:19: thab lcags khang nag po gru gsum pa /
NK039(ti)027:20: me ri 'bar ba'i dbus su bsgrang phreng ram gyis mtshan pa /
NK039(ti)027:21: de yongs su gyur pa las /
NK039(ti)027:22: me lha sku mdog mthing nag ra skyes khams pa la bcib pa /
NK039(ti)027:23: zhal gdangs shing mche ba gtsigs pa /
NK039(ti)027:25: g.yas gnyis ral gri dang dbyug tho /
NK039(ti)027:26: g.yon gnyis dril bu dang zhag pa 'dzin pa /
NK039(ti)027:27: sbrul nag po'i shing ral khar brgyan pa /
NK039(ti)027:28: stag gi lpags pa'i sham thabs byas pa /
NK039(ti)027:29: drang srong nag po'i 'khor gyi bskor ba /
NK039(ti)027:31: mgrin par +aah thugs kar h'u las 'od zer 'phros
NK039(ti)027:32: pas shar lho'i mtshams nas me lha spyan drangs ba
NK039(ti)027:34: dad pa dang ni dam tshig gis //
NK039(ti)027:35: tshur byon tshur gshegs 'byung po che //
NK039(ti)027:36: me lha'i rgyal po drang srong mchog /
NK039(ti)027:37: bsregs blug zhal zas bzhes slad du //
NK039(ti)027:38: drag po'i las la spyan 'dren no //
NK039(ti)027:39: 'bar ba'i gdan la bzhugs su gsol //
NK039(ti)027:44: mi'i sha tshil khrag chang sbyar //
NK039(ti)027:45: khrag gi yon chab dmar po 'di //
NK039(ti)027:47: bzhes shig dgra bgegs bsgral du gsol //
NK039(ti)027:49: dur khrod gnas su skyes pa yis //
NK039(ti)027:50: dug gi me tog nag po 'di //
NK039(ti)027:52: bzhes shig dgra bgegs bsgral du gsol //
NK039(ti)027:53: ag+ne pash+pe +aahmh'uh sha chen dug dang sbyar ba yis //
NK039(ti)027:54: dug gi bdug spos nag po 'di //
NK039(ti)027:56: bzhes shig dgra bgegs bsgral du gsol //
NK039(ti)027:58: mi tshil khrag dang sbyar ba yi //
NK039(ti)027:59: tshil chen zhun me'i sgron me 'di //
NK039(ti)027:61: bzhes shig dgra bgegs bsgral du gsol //
NK039(ti)027:63: khrag chen dug dang sbyar ba yi //
NK039(ti)027:65: me lha 'khor dang bzhes shig ag+ne gan+d+he +aahmh'u /
NK039(ti)027:67: sha chen khrag gi byug pa 'di //
NK039(ti)027:68: me lha bzhes shig ag+ne nee wit+ya +aa h'u /
NK039(ti)027:69: rkang chen gling bu g+han+di rnga /
NK039(ti)027:70: drag po'i rol mo sgra sgrogs 'di //
NK039(ti)027:71: me lha 'khor dang bzhes shig dgra ag+ne shab+ta +aa h'u /
NK039(ti)027:73: me lha'i rgyal po drang srong mchog /
NK039(ti)027:74: kha dog nag po mi bzad pa //
NK039(ti)027:76: g.yas gnyis ral gri dbyug to bsnams //
NK039(ti)027:77: g.yon gnyis dril bu zhag pa bsnams //
NK039(ti)027:78: ut+pala sngon po se ral kha //
NK039(ti)027:79: snying ka gsang gnas smin mtshams su //
NK039(ti)027:80: yi ge ram gyis rab mdzes pa //
NK039(ti)027:82: de la bdag gis phyag 'tshal bstod //
NK039(ti)027:86: bdag cag rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi bstan pa dar rgyas su mdzad du gsol /
NK039(ti)027:87: phrin las su bcol ba ni /
NK039(ti)027:88: ming rus gzugs su bris pa'i dgra bgegs rnams //
NK039(ti)027:89: bsad mnan gzir gsum gyi las drag po myur du mdzod cig /
NK039(ti)027:91: me lha me'i rang bzhin du gnas par gyur /
NK039(ti)027:92: de nas b+h+r+aum las bskyed rim bya /
NK039(ti)027:93: ma yi nang nas ma cig ma //
NK039(ti)027:100: de nas sngags nam bsgrangs nas yar gtor /
NK039(ti)027:103: phrin las bcol gtor ma 'gugs 'dren bskul ba bya /
NK039(ti)027:107: ma bdud 'khor dang bcas pa rnams //
NK039(ti)027:108: dgra po'i las la spyan 'dren no //
NK039(ti)027:110: dzahmh'u bam hoh sa ma ya tish+tha lhan /
NK039(ti)027:112: h'uh mi khrag khyi khrag sbyar ba yi //
NK039(ti)027:113: raka ta'i dri chab dmar po 'di //
NK039(ti)027:115: bzhes shig dgra bgegs bsgral du gsol //
NK039(ti)027:116: ma h+aa ka li re ma ti ar+g+ham +aa h'u /
NK039(ti)027:118: puspe d+hup+pe a lo ke gan+d+he nee wi te shab+ta +aahmh'u /
NK039(ti)027:120: re ma ti la bdag gis bstod /
NK039(ti)027:136: sha byang bdun nam nyer gcig 'bul /
NK039(ti)027:140: ma bdud thugs dam bskul nas /
NK039(ti)027:141: thugs dam thugs rjes bdag la byin gyis rlobs //
NK039(ti)027:142: phrin las dgra bgegs bsgral ba'i dus la babs //
NK039(ti)027:143: bcol pa'i phrin las myur du 'grub par mdzod //
NK039(ti)027:145: las bum nang du pad zla'i gdan la /
